courses.course_name: Aerospace Engineering: Aircraft Fundamentals and Advanced

course_details.description: Aerospace and Aeronautical Engineering: Master the Mechanics of Airplanes - Aerodynamics, Flight Maneuvers, JET Engines
quick_view: Understand the basics of Aerospace Engineering
Understand the basics of stability and Aircraft Designs

courses.course_name: Computer Network: Networking fundamentals + Wireshark Basics

course_details.description: You will understand how computer networks are designed, implemented and applied at each layer.
quick_view: Structured Content with each section dedicated to unique aspect of Computer Networks
Dynamic Lecture presentations with example demonstrations wherever necessary to help students learn by visualization
Lifetime Free Upgrades: New Lectures, Resources, Tips and Interview guides added regularly to keep up with current job markets.

courses.course_name: Chemical Engineering as a Professional Career

course_details.description: Ever wonder about Engineering? Or more specifically, about Chemical Engineering?
quick_view: Understand the Basics on Chemical Engineering
Areas in which a Chemical Engineer can work
Get to know the Curriculum of a Chemical Engineer

course_details.description: Course for Electrical Engineering Student who wants to know about Electrical Substations in Electric Power System.
quick_view: Understand the Great Importance of the Ring Main Unit in Power System.
Understand the Difference between Circuit Breaker and Fuse.
Understand the Benefit of Power Transformers in Substations.
